hint: ASLR means the stack and libc base are randomized, but the executable itself isn't.
name: Answer Machine
text: This answering machine program has ASLR enabled and a non-executable stack! Can you leave a message that bypasses them and gets the flag? Find it on the shell server at /problems/answer_machine/, and download the {{answer_machine, binary}} and {{answer_machine.c, source}}.
